#include <iostream>
#include <string>
#include <cstring>
#include <curl/curl.h>
#include <nlohmann/json.hpp>

using json = nlohmann::json;

class OpenAIClient {
private:
    std::string api_key_;
    std::string base_url_ = "https://api.openai.com/v1";

public:
    explicit OpenAIClient(const std::string& api_key) : api_key_(api_key) {}

    // å›è°ƒå‡½æ•°ç”¨äºæ¥æ”¶å“åº”æ•°æ®
    static size_t WriteCallback(void* contents, size_t size, size_t nmemb, std::string* userp) {
        userp->append((char*)contents, size * nmemb);
        return size * nmemb;
    }

    json chat(const std::string& model, const std::string& message) {
        CURL* curl = curl_easy_init();
        if (!curl) {
            throw std::runtime_error("Failed to initialize CURL");
        }

        // æ„å»ºè¯·æ±‚ä½“
        json request_body = {
            {"model", model},
            {"messages", {
                {{"role", "user"}, {"content", message}}
            }},
            {"max_tokens", 1000},
            {"temperature", 0.7}
        };

        std::string response_string;
        struct curl_slist* headers = nullptr;
        headers = curl_slist_append(headers, "Content-Type: application/json");
        
        std::string auth_header = "Authorization: Bearer " + api_key_;
        headers = curl_slist_append(headers, auth_header.c_str());

        curl_easy_setopt(curl, CURLOPT_URL, (base_url_ + "/chat/completions").c_str());
        curl_easy_setopt(curl, CURLOPT_POST, 1L);
        curl_easy_setopt(curl, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, request_body.dump().c_str());
        curl_easy_setopt(curl, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, headers);
        curl_easy_setopt(curl, CURLOPT_WRITEFUNCTION, WriteCallback);
        curl_easy_setopt(curl, CURLOPT_WRITEDATA, &response_string);
        curl_easy_setopt(curl, CURLOPT_TIMEOUT, 30L);
        curl_easy_setopt(curl, CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION, 1L);

        CURLcode res = curl_easy_perform(curl);
        
        long http_code = 0;
        curl_easy_getinfo(curl, CURLINFO_RESPONSE_CODE, &http_code);

        curl_slist_free_all(headers);
        curl_easy_cleanup(curl);

        if (res != CURLE_OK) {
            throw std::runtime_error("CURL request failed: " + std::string(curl_easy_strerror(res)));
        }

        if (http_code != 200) {
            throw std::runtime_error("API request failed with HTTP code: " + std::to_string(http_code));
        }

        return json::parse(response_string);
    }
};

int main() {
    // ä»ç¯å¢ƒå˜é‡è¯»å–API Key
    const char* api_key = std::getenv("OPENAI_API_KEY");
    if (!api_key) {
        std::cerr << "Error: Please set OPENAI_API_KEY environment variable" << std::endl;
        return 1;
    }

    try {
        OpenAIClient client(api_key);
        std::cout << "Sending request to OpenAI..." << std::endl;

        json response = client.chat("gpt-4o-mini", "è¯·ç”¨ä¸€å¥è¯ä»‹ç»ä½ è‡ªå·±");

        // è§£æå¹¶æ˜¾ç¤ºå“åº”
        std::string answer = response["choices"][0]["message"]["content"];
        std::cout << "AI Response: " << answer << std::endl;

    } catch (const std::exception& e) {
        std::cerr << "Error: " << e.what() << std::endl;
        return 1;
    }

    return 0;
}

#include <iostream>
#include "openai.hpp"

int main() {
    // ä»ç¯å¢ƒå˜é‡è¯»å–API Key
    const char* api_key = std::getenv("OPENAI_API_KEY");
    if (!api_key) {
        std::cerr << "Error: Please set OPENAI_API_KEY environment variable" << std::endl;
        return 1;
    }

    // åˆå§‹åŒ–APIé…ç½®
    openai::config api_key_config(api_key);
    openai::OpenAI openai(api_key_config);

    try {
        std::cout << "Sending request to OpenAI..." << std::endl;

        // åˆ›å»ºèŠå¤©è¯·æ±‚
        openai::ChatCompletions chat;
        chat.model = "gpt-4o-mini";
        chat.messages = {
            {{"role", "system"}, {"content", "ä½ æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªæœ‰ç”¨çš„åŠ©æ‰‹"}},
            {{"role", "user"}, {"content", "è¯·ç”¨ä¸€å¥è¯ä»‹ç»C++ç¼–ç¨‹è¯­è¨€"}}
        };
        chat.max_tokens = 500;
        chat.temperature = 0.7;

        // å‘é€è¯·æ±‚å¹¶è·å–å“åº”
        auto response = openai.chat().create(chat);

        // è§£æå“åº”
        std::string content = response["choices"][0]["message"]["content"];
        std::cout << "AI Response: " << content << std::endl;

    } catch (const std::exception& e) {
        std::cerr << "Error: " << e.what() << std::endl;
        return 1;
    }

    return 0;
}

#include <iostream>
#include <string>
#include <cpr/cpr.h>
#include <nlohmann/json.hpp>

using json = nlohmann::json;

class AIClient {
private:
    std::string api_key_;
    std::string base_url_;
    int timeout_ = 30;

public:
    AIClient(const std::string& api_key, const std::string& base_url = "https://api.openai.com/v1")
        : api_key_(api_key), base_url_(base_url) {}

    void set_timeout(int seconds) {
        timeout_ = seconds;
    }

    json chat(const std::string& model, const std::string& message) {
        // æ„å»ºè¯·æ±‚ä½“
        json request_body = {
            {"model", model},
            {"messages", {
                {{"role", "system"}, {"content", "You are a helpful assistant."}},
                {{"role", "user"}, {"content", message}}
            }},
            {"max_tokens", 1000},
            {"temperature", 0.7}
        };

        // å‘é€POSTè¯·æ±‚
        cpr::Response r = cpr::Post(
            cpr::Url{base_url_ + "/chat/completions"},
            cpr::Header{
                {"Content-Type", "application/json"},
                {"Authorization", "Bearer " + api_key_}
            },
            cpr::Body{request_body.dump()},
            cpr::Timeout{timeout_ * 1000}
        );

        // æ£€æŸ¥å“åº”çŠ¶æ€
        if (r.status_code != 200) {
            throw std::runtime_error("API request failed: HTTP " + 
                std::to_string(r.status_code) + " - " + r.text);
        }

        return json::parse(r.text);
    }

    // æµå¼å“åº”å¤„ç†
    void stream_chat(const std::string& model, const std::string& message,
                      std::function<void(const std::string&)> on_chunk) {
        json request_body = {
            {"model", model},
            {"messages", {
                {{"role", "user"}, {"content", message}}
            }},
            {"stream", true}
        };

        auto r = cpr::Post(
            cpr::Url{base_url_ + "/chat/completions"},
            cpr::Header{
                {"Content-Type", "application/json"},
                {"Authorization", "Bearer " + api_key_}
            },
            cpr::Body{request_body.dump()},
            cpr::Timeout{timeout_ * 1000},
            cpr::WriteCallback{[on_chunk](std::string data) {
                on_chunk(data);
                return data.size();
            }}
        );
    }
};

int main() {
    const char* api_key = std::getenv("OPENAI_API_KEY");
    if (!api_key) {
        std::cerr << "Error: Please set OPENAI_API_KEY environment variable" << std::endl;
        return 1;
    }

    try {
        AIClient client(api_key);
        
        std::cout << "Sending request to OpenAI..." << std::endl;
        json response = client.chat("gpt-4o-mini", "è¯·è§£é‡Šä»€ä¹ˆæ˜¯C++çš„RAIIç‰¹æ€§");

        std::string content = response["choices"][0]["message"]["content"];
        std::cout << "AI Response: " << content << std::endl;

    } catch (const std::exception& e) {
        std::cerr << "Error: " << e.what() << std::endl;
        return 1;
    }

    return 0;
}

#include <thread>
#include <chrono>

json chat_with_retry(const std::string& model, const std::string& message, 
                      int max_retries = 3) {
    int retry_count = 0;
    
    while (retry_count < max_retries) {
        try {
            return client.chat(model, message);
        } catch (const std::exception& e) {
            retry_count++;
            std::cerr << "Attempt " << retry_count << " failed: " << e.what() << std::endl;
            
            if (retry_count < max_retries) {
                // æŒ‡æ•°é€€é¿
                std::this_thread::sleep_for(std::chrono::seconds(std::pow(2, retry_count)));
            }
        }
    }
    
    throw std::runtime_error("All retry attempts failed");
}

---
name: git-release
description: Create consistent releases and changelogs
license: MIT
compatibility: opencode
---

## What I do
- Draft release notes from merged PRs
- Propose a version bump
- Provide a copy-pasteable `gh release create` command

## When to use me
Use this when you are preparing a tagged release.

    //æ¸²æŸ“å¾ªç¯

}

/** When the user changes the size of GlfwWindow , it will change the size of Viewport*/
void FrameBufferSizeCallback(GLFWwindow *Window, int Width, int Height)
{
    glViewport(0,0,Width,Height);
}

/** When the user press the "ESC" ,quit the Window */
void ProcessInput(GLFWwindow* Window)
{
    if (glfwGetKey(Window,GLFW_KEY_ESCAPE) == GLFW_PRESS)
    {
        glfwSetWindowShouldClose(Window,true);
    }
    
}

// ------------------------------------------------------------------
    float vertices[] = {
         0.5f,  0.5f, 0.0f,  // top right
         0.5f, -0.5f, 0.0f,  // bottom right
        -0.5f, -0.5f, 0.0f,  // bottom left
        -0.5f,  0.5f, 0.0f   // top left 
    };
    unsigned int indices[] = {  // note that we start from 0!
        0, 1, 3,  // first Triangle
        1, 2, 3   // second Triangle
    };
    unsigned int VBO, VAO, EBO;
    glGenVertexArrays(1, &VAO);
    glGenBuffers(1, &VBO);
    glGenBuffers(1, &EBO);

    glBindVertexArray(VAO);

    glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, VBO);
    glBufferData(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, sizeof(vertices), vertices, GL_STATIC_DRAW);

    glBindBuffer(GL_ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER, EBO);
    glBufferData(GL_ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER, sizeof(indices), indices, GL_STATIC_DRAW);

    glVertexAttribPointer(0, 3, GL_FLOAT, GL_FALSE, 3 * sizeof(float), (void*)0);
    glEnableVertexAttribArray(0);


    glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, 0); 

    glBindVertexArray(0); 
 while (!glfwWindowShouldClose(window))
 {
     processInput(window);

     glClearColor(0.2f, 0.3f, 0.3f, 1.0f);
     glClear(GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT);

     // draw our first triangle
     glUseProgram(shaderProgram);
     glBindVertexArray(VAO);
     glDrawElements(GL_TRIANGLES, 6, GL_UNSIGNED_INT, 0);

     glfwSwapBuffers(window);
     glfwPollEvents();
 }

struct Material {
    sampler2D diffuse;
    sampler2D specular;
    float shininess;
};
    
struct Dirlight {
    vec3 direction;

    vec3 ambient;
    vec3 diffuse;
    vec3 specular;
};

vec3 CalcDirLight(Dirlight light, vec3 normal, vec3 viewDir)
{
    vec3 lightDir = normalize(-light.direction);
    vec3 reflectDir = reflect(light.direction, normal);  

    vec3 ambient = light.ambient * texture(uMaterial.diffuse, TexCoord.xy).rgb ;   //ç¯å¢ƒå…‰
    vec3 diffuse = max(dot(normal, lightDir), 0.0f) * light.diffuse * texture(uMaterial.diffuse, TexCoord.xy).rgb;     //æ¼«åå°„
    vec3 specular = pow(max(dot(reflectDir,viewDir), 0.0f), uMaterial.shininess) * light.specular * texture(uMaterial.specular,TexCoord.xy).rgb;   //é•œé¢å…‰

    return (ambient + diffuse + specular);
}

struct Material {

    sampler2D specular; //é•œé¢å…‰è´´å›¾
    float shininess;    //é«˜å…‰æŒ‡æ•°
}; 
    
struct PointLight {
    vec3 position;      //ç‚¹å…‰æºä½ç½®

    float constant;     //å¸¸æ•°é¡¹
    float linear;       //çº¿æ€§é¡¹
    float quadratic;    //äºŒæ¬¡é¡¹

    vec3 ambient;       //ç¯å¢ƒå…‰
    vec3 diffuse;       //æ¼«åå°„
    vec3 specular;      //é•œé¢å…‰
};

vec3 CalcPointLight(PointLight light, vec3 normal, vec3 fragPos, vec3 viewDir)
{
    vec3 lightDir = normalize(light.position - fragPos);
    vec3 reflectDir = reflect(-lightDir, normal);  

    float distance = length(light.position - fragPos);
    float attenuation = 1.0f / (light.constant + light.linear * distance + light.quadratic * (distance * distance));

    vec3 ambient = light.ambient * texture(uMaterial.diffuse, TexCoord.xy).rgb ;   //ç¯å¢ƒå…‰
    vec3 diffuse = max(dot(normal, lightDir), 0.0f) * light.diffuse * texture(uMaterial.diffuse, TexCoord.xy).rgb;     //æ¼«åå°„
    vec3 specular = pow(max(dot(reflectDir,viewDir), 0.0f), uMaterial.shininess) * light.specular * texture(uMaterial.specular,TexCoord.xy).rgb;   //é•œé¢å…‰

    return (ambient + diffuse + specular) * attenuation;
}

Error Main::setup(const char *execpath, int argc, char *argv[], bool p_second_phase) {
    // ...
        
    // å‘½ä»¤è¡Œå‚æ•°è§£æå¾ªç¯
    while (I) {
        List<String>::Element *N = I->next();
        const String &arg = I->get();

        // 1. --help å‚æ•°å¤„ç†
        if (arg == "-h" || arg == "--help" || arg == "/?") {
            show_help = true;
            exit_err = ERR_HELP; // å¼ºåˆ¶æ—©æœŸé€€å‡ºï¼Œè¿”å›æˆåŠŸä»£ç 
            goto error;
        }
        
        // 2. --remote-debug å‚æ•°å¤„ç†
        else if (arg == "--remote-debug") {
            if (N) {
                debug_uri = N->get();
                if (!debug_uri.contains("://")) { // éªŒè¯åœ°å€æ ¼å¼
                    OS::get_singleton()->print(
                        "Invalid debug host address, it should be of the form <protocol>://<host/IP>:<port>.\n");
                    goto error;
                }
                N = N->next();
            } else {
                OS::get_singleton()->print("Missing remote debug host address, aborting.\n");
                goto error;
            }
        }
        
        // 3. --max-fps å‚æ•°å¤„ç†
        else if (arg == "--max-fps") {
            if (N) {
                max_fps = N->get().to_int();
                N = N->next();
            } else {
                OS::get_singleton()->print("Missing maximum FPS argument, aborting.\n");
                goto error;
            }
        }
        
        // 4. --time-scale å‚æ•°å¤„ç† ä»¥åŠå®ç°
        else if (arg == "--time-scale") {
            if (N) {
                // è®¾ç½®æ—¶é—´ç¼©æ”¾
                Engine::get_singleton()->set_time_scale(N->get().to_float());
                N = N->next();
            } else {
                OS::get_singleton()->print("Missing time scale argument, aborting.\n");
                goto error;
            }
        }
        
        I = N;

        //1. --help çš„å®ç°
        if (show_help) {
            print_help(execpath);
        }

        // 2. --remote-debug çš„å®ç°
        EngineDebugger::initialize(debug_uri, skip_breakpoints, breakpoints, []() {
            if (editor_pid) {
                DisplayServer::get_singleton()->enable_for_stealing_focus(editor_pid);
            }
	    });

        // 3. --max-fps çš„å®ç°
        Engine::get_singleton()->set_max_fps(GLOBAL_DEF(PropertyInfo(Variant::INT, "application/run/max_fps", PROPERTY_HINT_RANGE, "0,1000,1"), 0));
        if (max_fps >= 0) {
            Engine::get_singleton()->set_max_fps(max_fps);
        }
    }
}

bool ClassDB::get_inheritance_chain_nocheck(const StringName &p_class, Vector<StringName> &r_result) {
     //é”ä¸Šè¯»é”
	OBJTYPE_RLOCK;

    //éç©ºåˆ¤æ–­
	ClassInfo *start = classes.getptr(p_class);
	if (!start) {
		return false;
	}

    //å‘ä¸ŠæŸ¥è¯¢ï¼Œç›´è‡³çˆ¶ç±»æŒ‡é’ˆä¸ºç©º
	int classes_to_add = 0;
	for (ClassInfo *ti = start; ti; ti = ti->inherits_ptr) {
		classes_to_add++;
	}

    //æ‰©å®¹r_resultåˆ—è¡¨ï¼Œå¹¶å°†çˆ¶ç±»ååˆ—è¡¨ç§°æ·»åŠ è¿›åˆ—è¡¨
    //ä¸ç”¨push_backï¼Œå› ä¸ºpush_backä¼šåŠ¨æ€æ‰©å®¹ï¼Œæ€§èƒ½è¡¨ç°æ›´å·®ï¼Œè€Œresizeä¸ä¼š
	int64_t old_size = r_result.size();
	r_result.resize(old_size + classes_to_add);
	StringName *w = r_result.ptrw() + old_size;
	for (ClassInfo *ti = start; ti; ti = ti->inherits_ptr) {
		*w++ = ti->name;
	}

	return true;
}

void ClassDB::add_signal(const StringName &p_class, const MethodInfo &p_signal) {
	//é”ä¸Šå†™é”
	OBJTYPE_WLOCK;

	//ç±»ä¿¡æ¯éç©ºåˆ¤æ–­
	ClassInfo *type = classes.getptr(p_class);
	ERR_FAIL_NULL(type);

	//è·å–ä¿¡å·åç§°
	StringName sname = p_signal.name;

	//åŒåä¿¡å·æŠ¥é”™
#ifdef DEBUG_METHODS_ENABLED
	ClassInfo *check = type;
	while (check) {
		ERR_FAIL_COND_MSG(check->signal_map.has(sname), vformat("Class '%s' already has signal '%s'.", String(p_class), String(sname)));
		check = check->inherits_ptr;
	}
#endif
	//signal_mapä¸­æ·»åŠ ä¿¡å·
	type->signal_map[sname] = p_signal;
}

bool ClassDB::has_signal(const StringName &p_class, const StringName &p_signal, bool p_no_inheritance) {

	while (check) {

	}
	return false;
}

bool ClassDB::get_signal(const StringName &p_class, const StringName &p_signal, MethodInfo *r_signal) {
	//é”ä¸Šè¯»é” 
	OBJTYPE_RLOCK;
	ClassInfo *type = classes.getptr(p_class);
	ClassInfo *check = type;

	//å‘ä¸Šé€çº§æŸ¥è¯¢classinfoï¼Œç›´åˆ°objectç±»
	while (check) {
		//è·å–ä¿¡å·ä¿¡æ¯
		if (check->signal_map.has(p_signal)) {
			if (r_signal) {
				//è¿›è¡Œå€¼æ‹·è´
				*r_signal = check->signal_map[p_signal];
			}
			return true;
		}
		//çˆ¶ç±»ClassInfoæŒ‡é’ˆ
		check = check->inherits_ptr;
	}

	return false;
}

void ClassDB::get_signal_list(const StringName &p_class, List<MethodInfo> *p_signals, bool p_no_inheritance) {
	//é”ä¸Šè¯»é” éç©ºåˆ¤æ–­
	OBJTYPE_RLOCK;
	ClassInfo *type = classes.getptr(p_class);
	ERR_FAIL_NULL(type);

	//å‘ä¸Šé€çº§æŸ¥è¯¢classinfoï¼Œç›´åˆ°objectç±»
	ClassInfo *check = type;
	while (check) {
		//éå†æ‰€æœ‰ä¿¡å·ï¼Œå¹¶æ¨å…¥æ•°ç»„
		for (KeyValue<StringName, MethodInfo> &E : check->signal_map) {
			p_signals->push_back(E.value);
		}
		if (p_no_inheritance) {
			return;
		}
		check = check->inherits_ptr;
	}
}

void ClassDB::add_property(const StringName &p_class, const PropertyInfo &p_pinfo, const StringName &p_setter, const StringName &p_getter, int p_index) {
	//é”ä¸Šè¯»é”ï¼Œè·å–ç±»ä¿¡æ¯
	lock.read_lock();
	ClassInfo *type = classes.getptr(p_class);
	lock.read_unlock();

	//ç±»ä¿¡æ¯éç©ºåˆ¤æ–­
	ERR_FAIL_NULL(type);


	//è·å–setteræ–¹æ³•
	MethodBind *mb_set = nullptr;
	if (p_setter) {
		mb_set = get_method(p_class, p_setter);
#ifdef DEBUG_METHODS_ENABLED

		ERR_FAIL_NULL_MSG(mb_set, vformat("Invalid setter '%s::%s' for property '%s'.", p_class, p_setter, p_pinfo.name));

		int exp_args = 1 + (p_index >= 0 ? 1 : 0);
		ERR_FAIL_COND_MSG(mb_set->get_argument_count() != exp_args, vformat("Invalid function for setter '%s::%s' for property '%s'.", p_class, p_setter, p_pinfo.name));
#endif
	}

	//è·å–getteræ–¹æ³•
	MethodBind *mb_get = nullptr;
	if (p_getter) {
		mb_get = get_method(p_class, p_getter);
#ifdef DEBUG_METHODS_ENABLED

		ERR_FAIL_NULL_MSG(mb_get, vformat("Invalid getter '%s::%s' for property '%s'.", p_class, p_getter, p_pinfo.name));

		int exp_args = 0 + (p_index >= 0 ? 1 : 0);
		ERR_FAIL_COND_MSG(mb_get->get_argument_count() != exp_args, vformat("Invalid function for getter '%s::%s' for property '%s'.", p_class, p_getter, p_pinfo.name));
#endif
	}

	//å±æ€§åç§°é‡å¤æŠ¥é”™
#ifdef DEBUG_METHODS_ENABLED
	ERR_FAIL_COND_MSG(type->property_setget.has(p_pinfo.name), vformat("Object '%s' already has property '%s'.", p_class, p_pinfo.name));
#endif

	//é”ä¸Šå†™é”ï¼Œç›´åˆ°å‡½æ•°ç»“æŸ
	OBJTYPE_WLOCK

	//åœ¨classinfoä¸­æ·»åŠ å±æ€§ä¿¡æ¯
	type->property_list.push_back(p_pinfo);
	type->property_map[p_pinfo.name] = p_pinfo;
#ifdef DEBUG_METHODS_ENABLED
	if (mb_get) {
		type->methods_in_properties.insert(p_getter);
	}
	if (mb_set) {
		type->methods_in_properties.insert(p_setter);
	}
#endif

	//æ·»åŠ å±æ€§çš„setå’Œgetæ–¹æ³•ï¼Œé”®æ˜¯å±æ€§åç§°
	PropertySetGet psg;
	psg.setter = p_setter;
	psg.getter = p_getter;
	psg._setptr = mb_set;
	psg._getptr = mb_get;
	psg.index = p_index;
	psg.type = p_pinfo.type;

	type->property_setget[p_pinfo.name] = psg;
}

    ClassDB::bind_method(D_METHOD("set_position", "index", "value"), &MyNode::set_position);
    ClassDB::bind_method(D_METHOD("get_position", "index"), &MyNode::get_position);

    // æ·»åŠ æ•°ç»„å±æ€§ç»„ï¼ˆè™šæ‹Ÿå±æ€§ï¼‰ï¼Œå®šé•¿æ•°ç»„
	// æ·»åŠ æ¯ä¸ªå®é™…å±æ€§ï¼Œç®€æ˜“ç‰ˆæœ¬

    ClassDB::add_property_array("MyNode", "positions", "positions/");
    for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
        String name = "positions/" + itos(i);

        ClassDB::add_property("MyNode",
            PropertyInfo(Variant::VECTOR3, name),
            "set_position",
            "get_position",
			i);
    }

	//ä½¿ç”¨å®çš„ç‰ˆæœ¬å®ç°
	ADD_ARRAY("TestProperty", "TestProperty/");
	ADD_PROPERTYI(PropertyInfo(Variant::COLOR,"TestProperty/0"), "set_TP_color", "get_TP_color",1);
	ADD_PROPERTYI(PropertyInfo(Variant::COLOR,"TestProperty/1"), "set_TP_color", "get_TP_color",2);
	ClassDB::add_property("NsTestResource",
		PropertyInfo(Variant::VECTOR3,"TestProperty/2"),
		"set_TP_vector3", 
		"get_TP_vector3",
		0
	);
}

}

//æ­¤å¤„ä»…å¯¹æ•°ç»„é•¿åº¦è¿›è¡Œæ³¨å†Œï¼Œå…¶ä»–å±æ€§ä¸æ³¨å†Œ

// ä¸‹æ–¹æ˜¯ä¸‰ä¸ªé…å¥—å‡½æ•°ï¼š_set()ã€_get()ã€_get_property_list()
// æ­¤å¤„çœŸæ­£å®šä¹‰çš„æ•°ç»„ä¸­å±æ€§çš„è¡Œä¸º
bool NsTestResource::_set(const StringName &p_name, const Variant &p_value){
	Vector<String> components = String(p_name).split("/", true, 2);
	if (components.size() >= 2 && components[0].begins_with("color_") && components[0].trim_prefix("color_").is_valid_int()) {
		int index = components[0].trim_prefix("color_").to_int();
		const String &property = components[1];
		if (property == "color") {
			// set_point_position(point_index, p_value);
			set_color(index, p_value);
			return true;
		}
		if (property == "shader") {
			set_shader(index,p_value);
			return true;
		}
	}

	return false;
}
bool NsTestResource::_get(const StringName &p_name, Variant &r_ret)const {
	Vector<String> components = String(p_name).split("/", true, 2);
	if (components.size() >= 2 && components[0].begins_with("color_") && components[0].trim_prefix("color_").is_valid_int()) {
		int index = components[0].trim_prefix("color_").to_int();
		const String &property = components[1];
		if (property == "color") {
			r_ret = get_color(index);
			return true;
		}
		if (property == "shader") {
			r_ret = get_shader(index);
			return true;
		}
	}
	return false;
}
void NsTestResource::_get_property_list(List<PropertyInfo> *p_list)const {
	print_line("NsTestResource::_get_property_list");
	for (int i = 0; i < colors.size();i++) {
		PropertyInfo pi = PropertyInfo(Variant::COLOR, vformat("color_%d/color",i));
		p_list->push_back(pi);
		pi = PropertyInfo(Variant::OBJECT, vformat("color_%d/shader",i),PROPERTY_HINT_RESOURCE_TYPE, "Shader");
		p_list->push_back(pi);
	}
}

	//æ ¹æ®ç¼©è¿›ï¼Œè¿›è¡Œå‰ç¼€æ‹¼æ¥
	String prefix = p_prefix;
	if (p_indent_depth > 0) {
		prefix = vformat("%s,%d", p_prefix, p_indent_depth);
	}

	//åœ¨ç±»å‹ä¿¡æ¯çš„property_listä¸­ï¼Œå¡«å…¥åˆ†ç»„çš„å±æ€§
	type->property_list.push_back(
		PropertyInfo(Variant::NIL, //å ä½
			p_name, //åˆ†ç»„å
			PROPERTY_HINT_NONE, //æ— æç¤º
			prefix, //å‰ç¼€
			PROPERTY_USAGE_GROUP//ä½¿ç”¨ç±»å‹ä¸º åˆ†ç»„
			)
		);
}

void ClassDB::get_property_list(const StringName &p_class, List<PropertyInfo> *p_list, bool p_no_inheritance, const Object *p_validator) {
	//é”ä¸Šè¯»é”,ç›´åˆ°å‡ºä½œç”¨åŸŸ
	OBJTYPE_RLOCK;

	//é€çº§å‘çˆ¶ç±»æŸ¥è¯¢ç±»å‹ä¿¡æ¯
	ClassInfo *type = classes.getptr(p_class);
	ClassInfo *check = type;
	while (check) {
		//éå†å±æ€§åˆ—è¡¨ä¿¡æ¯
		for (const PropertyInfo &pi : check->property_list) {
			//æ˜¯å¦å…³è”å®ä¾‹
			if (p_validator) {
				// Making a copy as we may modify it.
				PropertyInfo pi_mut = pi;
				p_validator->validate_property(pi_mut);
				p_list->push_back(pi_mut);
			} else {
				//ä¸å…³è”å°±å°†property_listç›´æ¥æ¨å…¥åˆ—è¡¨p_list
				p_list->push_back(pi);
			}
		}
		//æ˜¯å¦æŸ¥è¯¢çˆ¶ç±»ï¼Œå¦‚æœä¸æŸ¥è¯¢ï¼Œç›´æ¥è¿”å›
		if (p_no_inheritance) {
			return;
		}
		//å˜æ›´ä¸ºçˆ¶ç±»ç±»å‹ä¿¡æ¯æŒ‡é’ˆ
		check = check->inherits_ptr;
	}
}

bool ClassDB::get_property(Object *p_object, const StringName &p_property, Variant &r_value) {
	//ç©ºæŒ‡é’ˆæ£€æµ‹
	ERR_FAIL_NULL_V(p_object, false);

	//å‘ä¸Šé€çº§æŸ¥è¯¢ç±»å‹ä¿¡æ¯
	ClassInfo *type = classes.getptr(p_object->get_class_name());
	ClassInfo *check = type;
	while (check) {
		//æŸ¥è¯¢ç±»å‹ä¿¡æ¯ä¸­çš„property_setget
		const PropertySetGet *psg = check->property_setget.getptr(p_property);
		if (psg) {
			//å­˜åœ¨PropertySetGetï¼Œä½†æ˜¯æ²¡æœ‰getteræ–¹æ³•
			if (!psg->getter) {
				return true; //return true but do nothing
			}

			if (psg->index >= 0) {
				Variant index = psg->index;
				const Variant *arg[1] = { &index };
				Callable::CallError ce;
				//åˆ©ç”¨å¯¹è±¡å®ä¾‹çš„callpæ–¹æ³•ï¼ŒåŠ¨æ€è°ƒç”¨è¯¥å±æ€§çš„getteræ–¹æ³•
				//å¯¹äºç´¢å¼•ä¸ä¸º-1ï¼ˆæ•°ç»„ï¼‰çš„å±æ€§å€¼ï¼Œéœ€è¦ä¼ å…¥ç´¢å¼•å‚æ•°
				const Variant value = p_object->callp(psg->getter, arg, 1, ce);
				r_value = (ce.error == Callable::CallError::CALL_OK) ? value : Variant();

			} else {
				Callable::CallError ce;
				if (psg->_getptr) {
					//é€šè¿‡MethodBindæŒ‡é’ˆ_getptrè°ƒç”¨getteræ–¹æ³•
					r_value = psg->_getptr->call(p_object, nullptr, 0, ce);
				} else {
					const Variant value = p_object->callp(psg->getter, nullptr, 0, ce);
					r_value = (ce.error == Callable::CallError::CALL_OK) ? value : Variant();
				}
			}
			return true;
		}

		const int64_t *c = check->constant_map.getptr(p_property); //constants count
		if (c) {
			r_value = *c;
			return true;
		}

		if (check->method_map.has(p_property)) { //methods count
			r_value = Callable(p_object, p_property);
			return true;
		}

		if (check->signal_map.has(p_property)) { //signals count
			r_value = Signal(p_object, p_property);
			return true;
		}

		check = check->inherits_ptr;
	}

	// The "free()" method is special, so we assume it exists and return a Callable.
	if (p_property == CoreStringName(free_)) {
		r_value = Callable(p_object, p_property);
		return true;
	}

	return false;
}

template <typename... VarArgs>
MethodDefinition D_METHOD(const char *p_name, const VarArgs... p_args) {
	//åˆ›å»ºå‚æ•°åˆ—è¡¨args,åˆ©ç”¨åˆ—è¡¨åˆå§‹åŒ–å±•å¼€å‚æ•°åŒ…p_args
	//æ”¶é›†æ‰€æœ‰å‚æ•°åç§°
	const char *args[sizeof...(p_args) + 1] = { p_args..., nullptr }; // +1 makes sure zero sized arrays are also supported.
	const char *const *argptrs[sizeof...(p_args) + 1];
	for (uint32_t i = 0; i < sizeof...(p_args); i++) {
		argptrs[i] = &args[i];
	}
	//å°†æ”¶é›†çš„å‚æ•°åˆ—è¡¨ï¼Œä¼ å…¥D_METHODP()è¿›è¡ŒMDçš„åˆ›å»º
	return D_METHODP(p_name, sizeof...(p_args) == 0 ? nullptr : (const char *const **)argptrs, sizeof...(p_args));
}

MethodDefinition D_METHODP(const char *p_name, const char *const **p_args, uint32_t p_argcount) {
	//å®é™…åˆ›å»ºMethodDefinitionï¼Œå¡«å…¥å‡½æ•°åç§°å’Œå‚æ•°åç§°åˆ—è¡¨
	MethodDefinition md;
	md.name = StaticCString::create(p_name);
	md.args.resize(p_argcount);
	for (uint32_t i = 0; i < p_argcount; i++) {
		md.args.write[i] = StaticCString::create(*p_args[i]);
	}
	return md;
}

template <typename N, typename M, typename... VarArgs>
static MethodBind *bind_method(N p_method_name, M p_method, VarArgs... p_args) {
	//åˆ›å»ºå‚æ•°åˆ—è¡¨args,åˆ©ç”¨åˆ—è¡¨åˆå§‹åŒ–å±•å¼€å‚æ•°åŒ…p_args
	Variant args[sizeof...(p_args) + 1] = { p_args..., Variant() }; // +1 makes sure zero sized arrays are also supported.
	//åˆ›å»ºå‚æ•°æŒ‡é’ˆåˆ—è¡¨argptrs
	const Variant *argptrs[sizeof...(p_args) + 1];
	//éå†å‚æ•°åˆ—è¡¨argsï¼Œå¹¶å°†å‚æ•°æŒ‡é’ˆä¿å­˜åˆ°argptrsä¸­
	for (uint32_t i = 0; i < sizeof...(p_args); i++) {
		argptrs[i] = &args[i];
	}

	//åˆ›å»ºå‡½æ•°ç»‘å®šMethodBind
	//æ­¤å¤„æ¯”è¾ƒå¤æ‚ï¼Œæš‚æ—¶ä¸å±•å¼€
	MethodBind *bind = create_method_bind(p_method);
	if constexpr (std::is_same_v<typename member_function_traits<M>::return_type, Object *>) {
		bind->set_return_type_is_raw_object_ptr(true);
	}

	//å°†å‡½æ•°ç»‘å®šä¿¡æ¯çš„æ³¨å†Œåˆ°ClassDBä¸­
	return bind_methodfi(METHOD_FLAGS_DEFAULT, bind, false, p_method_name, sizeof...(p_args) == 0 ? nullptr : (const Variant **)argptrs, sizeof...(p_args));
}

struct ClassInfo {
    // æ ¹æ®æ³¨å†Œçš„æ—¶æœºå’Œæ¥å£ä¸åŒï¼ŒAPIç±»å‹æœ‰ä»¥ä¸‹5ç§ï¼š
    // API_COREã€

    // API_NONE
    APIType api = API_NONE;

	//çˆ¶ç±»çš„ç±»ä¿¡æ¯æŒ‡é’ˆ
    ClassInfo *inherits_ptr = nullptr;
    void *class_ptr = nullptr;

	//gdextensionæŒ‡é’ˆ

	//ç±»çš„æ–¹æ³•ä¿¡æ¯ï¼Œé”®æ˜¯æ–¹æ³•åï¼Œå€¼æ˜¯æ–¹æ³•ç»‘å®š
    HashMap<StringName, MethodBind *> method_map;
    HashMap<StringName, LocalVector<MethodBind *>> method_map_compatibility;
    HashMap<StringName, int64_t> constant_map;
    struct EnumInfo {
        List<StringName> constants;
        bool is_bitfield = false;
    };

    HashMap<StringName, EnumInfo> enum_map;

	//ç±»ä¿¡å·ä¿¡æ¯ï¼Œé”®æ˜¯ä¿¡å·å
    HashMap<StringName, MethodInfo> signal_map;

	//ç±»å±æ€§ä¿¡æ¯åˆ—è¡¨

	//ç±»å±æ€§ä¿¡æ¯ï¼Œé”®æ˜¯å±æ€§åç§°ï¼Œå€¼æ˜¯å±æ€§ä¿¡æ¯
    HashMap<StringName, PropertyInfo> property_map;

	//ç±»å±æ€§set/getä¿¡æ¯ï¼Œé”®æ˜¯å±æ€§åç§°ï¼Œå€¼æ˜¯å±æ€§è®¾ç½®å’Œè·å–æ–¹æ³•ä¿¡æ¯
    HashMap<StringName, PropertySetGet> property_setget;

    HashMap<StringName, Vector<uint32_t>> virtual_methods_compat;

	//çˆ¶ç±»åç§°
    StringName inherits;
	//è‡ªèº«ç±»å
    StringName name;

    bool disabled = false;
    bool exposed = false;
    bool reloadable = false;
    bool is_virtual = false;
    bool is_runtime = false;
    // The bool argument indicates the need to postinitialize.
    Object *(*creation_func)(bool) = nullptr;

    ClassInfo() {}
    ~ClassInfo() {}
};

struct MethodInfo {
	String name;
	PropertyInfo return_val;
	uint32_t flags = METHOD_FLAGS_DEFAULT;
	int id = 0;
	List<PropertyInfo> arguments;
	Vector<Variant> default_arguments;
	int return_val_metadata = 0;
	Vector<int> arguments_metadata;

	int get_argument_meta(int p_arg) const {
		ERR_FAIL_COND_V(p_arg < -1 || p_arg > arguments.size(), 0);
		if (p_arg == -1) {
			return return_val_metadata;
		}
		return arguments_metadata.size() > p_arg ? arguments_metadata[p_arg] : 0;
	}

	inline bool operator==(const MethodInfo &p_method) const { return id == p_method.id && name == p_method.name; }
	inline bool operator<(const MethodInfo &p_method) const { return id == p_method.id ? (name < p_method.name) : (id < p_method.id); }

	operator Dictionary() const;

	static MethodInfo from_dict(const Dictionary &p_dict);

	uint32_t get_compatibility_hash() const;

	MethodInfo() {}

	explicit MethodInfo(const GDExtensionMethodInfo &pinfo) :
			name(*reinterpret_cast<StringName *>(pinfo.name)),
			return_val(PropertyInfo(pinfo.return_value)),
			flags(pinfo.flags),
			id(pinfo.id) {
		for (uint32_t j = 0; j < pinfo.argument_count; j++) {
			arguments.push_back(PropertyInfo(pinfo.arguments[j]));
		}
		const Variant *def_values = (const Variant *)pinfo.default_arguments;
		for (uint32_t j = 0; j < pinfo.default_argument_count; j++) {
			default_arguments.push_back(def_values[j]);
		}
	}

	void _push_params(const PropertyInfo &p_param) {
		arguments.push_back(p_param);
	}

	template <typename... VarArgs>
	void _push_params(const PropertyInfo &p_param, VarArgs... p_params) {
		arguments.push_back(p_param);
		_push_params(p_params...);
	}

	MethodInfo(const String &p_name) { name = p_name; }

	template <typename... VarArgs>
	MethodInfo(const String &p_name, VarArgs... p_params) {
		name = p_name;
		_push_params(p_params...);
	}

	MethodInfo(Variant::Type ret) { return_val.type = ret; }
	MethodInfo(Variant::Type ret, const String &p_name) {
		return_val.type = ret;
		name = p_name;
	}

	template <typename... VarArgs>
	MethodInfo(Variant::Type ret, const String &p_name, VarArgs... p_params) {
		name = p_name;
		return_val.type = ret;
		_push_params(p_params...);
	}

	MethodInfo(const PropertyInfo &p_ret, const String &p_name) {
		return_val = p_ret;
		name = p_name;
	}

	template <typename... VarArgs>
	MethodInfo(const PropertyInfo &p_ret, const String &p_name, VarArgs... p_params) {
		return_val = p_ret;
		name = p_name;
		_push_params(p_params...);
	}
};

struct PropertyInfo {
	Variant::Type type = Variant::NIL;
	String name;
	StringName class_name; // For classes
	PropertyHint hint = PROPERTY_HINT_NONE;
	String hint_string;
	uint32_t usage = PROPERTY_USAGE_DEFAULT;

	// If you are thinking about adding another member to this class, ask the maintainer (Juan) first.

	_FORCE_INLINE_ PropertyInfo added_usage(uint32_t p_fl) const {
		PropertyInfo pi = *this;
		pi.usage |= p_fl;
		return pi;
	}

	operator Dictionary() const;

	static PropertyInfo from_dict(const Dictionary &p_dict);

	PropertyInfo() {}

	PropertyInfo(const Variant::Type p_type, const String &p_name, const PropertyHint p_hint = PROPERTY_HINT_NONE, const String &p_hint_string = "", const uint32_t p_usage = PROPERTY_USAGE_DEFAULT, const StringName &p_class_name = StringName()) :
			type(p_type),
			name(p_name),
			hint(p_hint),
			hint_string(p_hint_string),
			usage(p_usage) {
		if (hint == PROPERTY_HINT_RESOURCE_TYPE) {
			class_name = hint_string;
		} else {
			class_name = p_class_name;
		}
	}

	PropertyInfo(const StringName &p_class_name) :
			type(Variant::OBJECT),
			class_name(p_class_name) {}

	explicit PropertyInfo(const GDExtensionPropertyInfo &pinfo) :
			type((Variant::Type)pinfo.type),
			name(*reinterpret_cast<StringName *>(pinfo.name)),
			class_name(*reinterpret_cast<StringName *>(pinfo.class_name)),
			hint((PropertyHint)pinfo.hint),
			hint_string(*reinterpret_cast<String *>(pinfo.hint_string)),
			usage(pinfo.usage) {}

	bool operator==(const PropertyInfo &p_info) const {
		return ((type == p_info.type) &&
				(name == p_info.name) &&
				(class_name == p_info.class_name) &&
				(hint == p_info.hint) &&
				(hint_string == p_info.hint_string) &&
				(usage == p_info.usage));
	}

	bool operator<(const PropertyInfo &p_info) const {
		return name < p_info.name;
	}
};

#include <godot_cpp/classes/rendering_server.hpp>
#include <godot_cpp/classes/rendering_device.hpp>
using namespace godot;

void dump_gpu_pass_times_ms() {
    Ref<RenderingDevice> rd = RenderingServer::get_singleton()->get_rendering_device();
    if (rd.is_null()) return;

    const uint32_t count = rd->get_captured_timestamps_count();      // é‡‡é›†åˆ°çš„æ ‡ç­¾æ•°
    const uint64_t frame  = rd->get_captured_timestamps_frame();     // å¯¹åº”çš„å¸§å·ï¼ˆå¯é€‰ï¼‰
    for (uint32_t i = 0; i < count; i++) {
        String name = rd->get_captured_timestamp_name(i);            // ä¾‹å¦‚ "Depth Prepass"
        double gpu_ms = rd->get_captured_timestamp_gpu_time(i) / 1e6; // çº³ç§’â†’æ¯«ç§’
        double cpu_ms = rd->get_captured_timestamp_cpu_time(i) / 1e6;
        // ä½ å¯ä»¥ç­›é€‰/é‡å‘½å/ç´¯åŠ åˆ°è‡ªå·±çš„ç»Ÿè®¡é‡Œ
        UtilityFunctions::print(vformat("[%s] GPU %.3f ms, CPU %.3f ms (frame %d)",
                             name, gpu_ms, cpu_ms, (int)frame));
    }
}

//----------------å¤´æ–‡ä»¶----------------
#ifndef TEST_H
#define TEST_H

#include <godot_cpp/classes/node3d.hpp>
#include <godot_cpp/classes/texture2d.hpp>

using namespace godot;

class Test : public Node3D
{
    GDCLASS(Test,Node3D)
public:
    enum ETest{
        None,
        Enum1,
        Enum2,
        Num
    };
    enum EFlag{
        FlagNone = 0,
        Flag1 = 1 << 0,
        Flag2 = 1 << 1,
        Flag3 = 1 << 2,
    };
public:
    Test();
    ~Test();
    void StartTest();

    void StartTest2();

    int GetIValue();
    void SetIValue(int input);

    float GetFValue();
    void SetFValue(float input);

    String GetSValue();
    void SetSValue(String input);

    Ref<Texture2D> GetTValue();
    void SetTValue(Ref<Texture2D> input);

    ETest GetEValue();
    void SetEValue(ETest input);

    BitField<EFlag> GetFlagValue();
    void SetFlagValue(BitField<EFlag> input);

protected:
    static void _bind_methods();

private:
    int IValue = 0;
    float FValue = 0.0f;
    String SValue = "Hello";
    Ref<Texture2D> TValue;
    ETest EValue = ETest::None;
    BitField<EFlag> flag = EFlag::FlagNone;
};

VARIANT_ENUM_CAST(Test::ETest);
VARIANT_BITFIELD_CAST(Test::EFlag);


#endif


//----------------æºæ–‡ä»¶----------------
#include "Test.h"
#include <godot_cpp/core/class_db.hpp>
#include <godot_cpp/variant/utility_functions.hpp>
#include <godot_cpp/classes/image_texture.hpp>

Test::Test()
{
    connect("ready",Callable(this,"StartTest2"));
}

Test::~Test()
{
}

void Test::StartTest()
{
    UtilityFunctions::print("AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA");
    Ref<ImageTexture> AA(memnew(ImageTexture));
    UtilityFunctions::print("AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA:",AA->get_reference_count());

    auto format = AA->get_format();
    Ref<ImageTexture> BB = AA;
    UtilityFunctions::print("AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA:",AA->get_reference_count());

}

void Test::StartTest2()
{
    UtilityFunctions::print("BBBBBBBBBBBBBBB:",IValue);
    emit_signal("HelloSignal","CCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCC");
    // UtilityFunctions::print("BBBBBBBBBBBBBBB:",IValue,"---",FValue,"---",SValue,"---",TValue->get_name());
}

int Test::GetIValue()
{
    return IValue;
}

void Test::SetIValue(int input)
{
    IValue = input;
}

float Test::GetFValue()
{
    return FValue;
}

void Test::SetFValue(float input)
{
    FValue = input;
}

String Test::GetSValue()
{
    return SValue;
}

void Test::SetSValue(String input)
{
    SValue = input;
}

Ref<Texture2D> Test::GetTValue()
{
    return TValue;
}

void Test::SetTValue(Ref<Texture2D> input)
{
    TValue = input;
}

Test::ETest Test::GetEValue()
{
    return EValue;
}

void Test::SetEValue(ETest input)
{
    EValue = input;
}

BitField<Test::EFlag> Test::GetFlagValue()
{
    return flag;
}

void Test::SetFlagValue(BitField<EFlag> input)
{
    flag = input;
}

void Test::_bind_methods()
{
    BIND_ENUM_CONSTANT(None);
    BIND_ENUM_CONSTANT(Enum1);
    BIND_ENUM_CONSTANT(Enum2);
    BIND_ENUM_CONSTANT(Num);

    BIND_BITFIELD_FLAG(FlagNone);
    BIND_BITFIELD_FLAG(Flag1);
    BIND_BITFIELD_FLAG(Flag2);
    BIND_BITFIELD_FLAG(Flag3);

    ADD_SIGNAL(MethodInfo("HelloSignal",PropertyInfo(Variant::STRING,"message")));

    ClassDB::bind_method(D_METHOD("StartTest"),&Test::StartTest);
    ClassDB::bind_method(D_METHOD("StartTest2"),&Test::StartTest2);
    
    ClassDB::bind_method(D_METHOD("GetIValue"),&Test::GetIValue);
    ClassDB::bind_method(D_METHOD("SetIValue","IValue"),&Test::SetIValue);
    ADD_PROPERTY(PropertyInfo(Variant::INT,"IValue"),"SetIValue","GetIValue");

    ClassDB::bind_method(D_METHOD("GetFValue"),&Test::GetFValue);
    ClassDB::bind_method(D_METHOD("SetFValue","FValue"),&Test::SetFValue);
    ADD_PROPERTY(PropertyInfo(Variant::FLOAT,"FValue"),"SetFValue","GetFValue");

    ClassDB::bind_method(D_METHOD("GetSValue"),&Test::GetSValue);
    ClassDB::bind_method(D_METHOD("SetSValue","SValue"),&Test::SetSValue);
    ADD_PROPERTY(PropertyInfo(Variant::STRING,"SValue"),"SetSValue","GetSValue");

    ClassDB::bind_method(D_METHOD("GetTValue"),&Test::GetTValue);
    ClassDB::bind_method(D_METHOD("SetTValue","TValue"),&Test::SetTValue);
    ADD_PROPERTY(PropertyInfo(Variant::OBJECT,"TValue",PROPERTY_HINT_RESOURCE_TYPE,"Texture2D"),"SetIValue","GetIValue");

    ClassDB::bind_method(D_METHOD("GetEValue"),&Test::GetEValue);
    ClassDB::bind_method(D_METHOD("SetEValue","EValue"),&Test::SetEValue);
    ADD_PROPERTY(PropertyInfo(Variant::INT,"EValue",PROPERTY_HINT_ENUM,"None , Enum1 , Enum2"),"SetEValue","GetEValue");

    ClassDB::bind_method(D_METHOD("GetFlagValue"),&Test::GetFlagValue);
    ClassDB::bind_method(D_METHOD("SetFlagValue","flag"),&Test::SetFlagValue);
    ADD_PROPERTY(PropertyInfo(Variant::INT,"flag",PROPERTY_HINT_FLAGS,"FlagNone , Flag1 , Flag2 , Flag3"),"SetFlagValue","GetFlagValue");
}

// bool SplineGizmoPlugin::_has_gizmo(Node3D *p_for_node_3d) const {

//     UtilityFunctions::print(__FUNCTION__,p_for_node_3d->get_name());
//     return Object::cast_to<Spline>(p_for_node_3d) != nullptr;
// }

Ref<EditorNode3DGizmo> SplineGizmoPlugin::_create_gizmo(Node3D *p_for_node_3d) const{
    UtilityFunctions::print("SplineGizmoPlugin::_create_gizmo :: Try to create gizmo for :: ",p_for_node_3d->get_name());

    bool bIsSpline = Object::cast_to<Spline>(p_for_node_3d) != nullptr;
    if (bIsSpline) {
        UtilityFunctions::print("SplineGizmoPlugin::_create_gizmo :: ",p_for_node_3d->get_name());
        Ref<EditorNode3DGizmo> Gizmo = memnew(SplineGizmo(p_for_node_3d));
        return Gizmo;
    }
    
    return nullptr;
}

void SplineGizmoPlugin::_redraw(const Ref<EditorNode3DGizmo> &p_gizmo){
    UtilityFunctions::print("SplineGizmoPlugin::_redraw :: " , p_gizmo->get_node_3d()->get_name());
    p_gizmo->_redraw();
}

#pragma once
#ifndef SPLINE_GIZMO_H
#define SPLINE_GIZMO_H

#include "Spline.h"
#include "godot_cpp/classes/node3d.hpp"


// #include "godot_cpp/classes/editor_node3d_gizmo_plugin.hpp"

using namespace godot;

class SplineGizmo : public EditorNode3DGizmo
{
	GDCLASS(SplineGizmo, EditorNode3DGizmo);
protected:
    static void _bind_methods(){}
public:
    SplineGizmo(){}
    SplineGizmo(Node3D *p_node);
    ~SplineGizmo();
	virtual void _redraw() override;
    virtual void _commit_handle(int32_t p_id, bool p_secondary, const Variant &p_restore, bool p_cancel) override;
    virtual void _set_handle(int32_t p_id, bool p_secondary, Camera3D *p_camera, const Vector2 &p_point) override;
private:
    Spline * SplineInstance;

    Ref<Material> GreenMaterial;

//======================æºæ–‡ä»¶========================
#include "SplineGizmo.h"
#include "Spline.h"
#include "godot_cpp/classes/object.hpp"
#include "godot_cpp/classes/editor_node3d_gizmo_plugin.hpp"
#include "godot_cpp/classes/standard_material3d.hpp"
#include "godot_cpp/core/error_macros.hpp"
#include "godot_cpp/core/memory.hpp"
#include "godot_cpp/variant/array.hpp"
#include "godot_cpp/variant/utility_functions.hpp"
#include "godot_cpp/variant/vector3.hpp"


SplineGizmo::SplineGizmo(Node3D *p_node){
    set_node_3d(p_node);
    SplineInstance = Object::cast_to<Spline>(p_node);

}

SplineGizmo::~SplineGizmo(){

}

void SplineGizmo::_redraw(){
    UtilityFunctions::print(__FUNCTION__,"redraw::CCCCCCC :: ",get_node_3d()->get_name());
    clear();
    PackedVector3Array points;
    PackedInt32Array ids;
    PackedVector3Array lines;
    ERR_FAIL_COND(!SplineInstance);
    int numPoints = SplineInstance->GetControlPoints().size();
    ERR_FAIL_COND(numPoints == 0);

    for (int i = 0; i < numPoints; i++) {
        Vector3 CurPoint = SplineInstance->GetControlPoints()[i];
        points.append(CurPoint);
        ids.append(i);
    }

    int segNum = 100;
    Array TempP = SplineInstance->GetBezierCurve(segNum);
    for (int i = 0; i < segNum - 1; i++) {
        Vector3 CurPoint0 = TempP[i];
        Vector3 CurPoint1 = TempP[i + 1];
        lines.append(CurPoint0);
        lines.append(CurPoint1);
    }
    add_handles(points, get_plugin()->get_material("HandleMat",this),ids);
    add_lines(lines, get_plugin()->get_material("RedMat",this));   
}

void SplineGizmo::_commit_handle(int32_t p_id, bool p_secondary, const Variant &p_restore, bool p_cancel){
    UtilityFunctions::print("SplineGizmo::_commit_handle :: id :: ", p_id , " , Restore :: ", p_restore ,"NewPosition :: ");
}

void SplineGizmo::_set_handle(int32_t p_id, bool p_secondary, Camera3D *p_camera, const Vector2 &p_point){
    // UtilityFunctions::print("SplineGizmo::_set_handle :: id :: ", p_id , " , Screen Point :: ", p_point );
    if (!SplineInstance || !p_camera ) {
        return;
    }

    Array points = SplineInstance->GetControlPoints();
    Vector3 LocalLocation = points[p_id];
    Vector3 WorldLocation = SplineInstance->get_transform().xform(LocalLocation);
    UtilityFunctions::print("LocalLocation :: ", LocalLocation , " , WorldLocation :: ", WorldLocation );

    const Vector3 ray_o = p_camera->project_ray_origin(p_point);
    const Vector3 ray_d = p_camera->project_ray_normal(p_point);

    // UtilityFunctions::print("SplineGizmo::_set_handle :: id :: ", p_id , " , ray_o :: ",ray_o," , ray_d :: ",ray_d);

    // æ„é€ â€œå±å¹•å¹³é¢â€ï¼šè¿‡å½“å‰æŠŠæ‰‹ç‚¹ï¼Œæ³•çº¿ = ç›¸æœºå‰å‘ï¼ˆ-Z åˆ—ï¼‰
    const Vector3 cam_fwd = -p_camera->get_global_transform().basis.get_column(2).normalized();
    Plane view_plane(cam_fwd, WorldLocation);
    // UtilityFunctions::print("cam_fwd :: ", cam_fwd );


    Vector3 hit;
    if (!view_plane.intersects_ray(ray_o, ray_d, &hit)) {
        // å°„çº¿ä¸å¹³é¢è¿‘å¹³è¡Œï¼Œå¿½ç•¥è¿™å¸§
        return;
    }
    UtilityFunctions::print("Hit :: ",hit);

    points[p_id] = SplineInstance->get_transform().xform_inv(hit);
    SplineInstance->SetControlPoints(points);
    _redraw();
}

//=================ç±»çš„å®šä¹‰=======================
class MyEditorPlugin : public EditorPlugin {
    GDCLASS(MyEditorPlugin, EditorPlugin);

    Ref<SplineGizmoPlugin> gizmo_plugin;
protected:
    static void _bind_methods() {

    }
public:
    virtual void _enter_tree() override {
        UtilityFunctions::print("Init :: MyEditorPlugin :: _enter_tree");
        
        gizmo_plugin.instantiate();
        gizmo_plugin->create_handle_material("HandleMat");
        
        gizmo_plugin->create_material("RedMat", Color(1.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f));
        gizmo_plugin->create_material("GreenMat", Color(0.0f, 1.0f, 0.0f));
        gizmo_plugin->create_material("BlueMat", Color(0.0f, 0.0f, 1.0f));
        add_node_3d_gizmo_plugin(gizmo_plugin);
    }

    virtual void _exit_tree() override {
        UtilityFunctions::print("UnInit :: MyEditorPlugin :: _exit_tree");

        remove_node_3d_gizmo_plugin(gizmo_plugin);
    }
};

//==================ä½¿ç”¨ç¤ºä¾‹=======================
//==================register_types.cpp=======================
void initialize_GodotTest_module(ModuleInitializationLevel p_level) {
    if (p_level == MODULE_INITIALIZATION_LEVEL_SCENE) {
        UtilityFunctions::print("Init :: Scene");
        GDREGISTER_CLASS(FowTexture);
        GDREGISTER_CLASS(Spline);

    }

    if (p_level == MODULE_INITIALIZATION_LEVEL_EDITOR) {
        UtilityFunctions::print("Init :: Editor");
        GDREGISTER_CLASS(SplineGizmo);
        GDREGISTER_CLASS(SplineGizmoPlugin);
        GDREGISTER_CLASS(MyEditorPlugin);


        EditorPlugins::add_by_type<MyEditorPlugin>();

    }
    UtilityFunctions::print("Init :: None :: ", p_level);
}

#include "core/variant/array.h"
#include "core/variant/variant.h"

void demo_array() {
    // --- åˆ›å»º (Create) ---
    Array arr;

    // ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥åˆ›å»ºå¹¶æŒ‡å®šä¸ºç‰¹å®šç±»å‹çš„æ•°ç»„ï¼ˆä¾‹å¦‚åªå­˜ intï¼‰
    // Array typed_arr;
    // typed_arr.set_typed(Variant::INT, StringName(), Variant());

    // --- å¢ (Add) ---
    arr.push_back(10);          // è‡ªåŠ¨å°è£…ä¸º Variant(10)
    arr.append("Hello");        // è‡ªåŠ¨å°è£…ä¸º Variant("Hello")
    arr.push_front(3.14);       // æ’å…¥åˆ°å¤´éƒ¨
    
    // æ­¤æ—¶æ•°ç»„å†…å®¹å¯èƒ½ä¸º: [3.14, 10, "Hello"]

    // --- æŸ¥ (Read) ---
    if (!arr.is_empty()) {
        // operator[] è¿”å›çš„æ˜¯ Variant &
        Variant v = arr[0]; 
        
        // éœ€è¦æ ¹æ®ç±»å‹è½¬æ¢
        if (v.get_type() == Variant::FLOAT) {
            double d = v; // è‡ªåŠ¨è½¬å‹æ“ä½œç¬¦
            print_line(rtos(d));
        }
    }

    // éå†
    for (int i = 0; i < arr.size(); i++) {
        Variant item = arr[i];
        // print_line(item); // Variant é‡è½½äº† String è½¬æ¢
    }

    // --- æ”¹ (Update) ---
    arr[1] = "New Value"; // å°†ç´¢å¼• 1 çš„ 10 æ”¹ä¸ºå­—ç¬¦ä¸²

    // --- åˆ  (Delete) ---
    arr.remove_at(0); // ç§»é™¤ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªå…ƒç´ 
    arr.erase("New Value"); // ç§»é™¤åŒ¹é…å€¼çš„å…ƒç´ ï¼ˆçº¿æ€§æŸ¥æ‰¾ï¼‰
    arr.clear();
}

#include "core/variant/dictionary.h"
#include "core/variant/variant.h"

void demo_dictionary() {
    // --- åˆ›å»º (Create) ---
    Dictionary dict;

    // --- å¢ (Add) / æ”¹ (Update) ---
    dict["name"] = "Godot";      // é”®æ˜¯ String, å€¼æ˜¯ String
    dict[100] = "One Hundred";   // é”®æ˜¯ int, å€¼æ˜¯ String
    
    // ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥ä½œä¸ºå·¦å€¼ä¿®æ”¹
    dict["name"] = "Godot Engine";

    // --- æŸ¥ (Read) ---
    // æ£€æŸ¥é”®æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨
    if (dict.has("name")) {
        Variant v = dict["name"];
        String s = v; 
        print_line(s);
    }

    // å®‰å…¨è·å–ï¼ˆå¸¦é»˜è®¤å€¼ï¼‰
    // å¦‚æœ "score" ä¸å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œè¿”å› 0
    int score = dict.get("score", 0);

    // éå†
    // æ³¨æ„ï¼šéå†å­—å…¸é€šå¸¸éå†çš„æ˜¯ Key
    List<Variant> keys;
    dict.get_key_list(&keys); // è·å–æ‰€æœ‰ key åˆ°ä¸€ä¸ª List ä¸­
    
    for (const Variant &key : keys) {
        Variant value = dict[key];
        print_line(String(key) + " : " + String(value));
    }

    // --- åˆ  (Delete) ---
    dict.erase(100); // åˆ é™¤é”®ä¸º 100 çš„æ¡ç›®
    bool removed = dict.erase("name"); // è¿”å›æ˜¯å¦åˆ é™¤æˆåŠŸ
}

#include "core/templates/vmap.h"

void demo_vmap() {
    VMap<int, String> player_names;

    // --- å¢ (Add) ---
    // æ³¨æ„ï¼šinsert ä¼šæ£€æŸ¥é”®æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œå­˜åœ¨åˆ™è¦†ç›–ï¼Œä¸å­˜åœ¨åˆ™ä¿æŒæ’åºæ’å…¥
    player_names.insert(1, "Alice");
    player_names.insert(2, "Bob");
    player_names.insert(10, "Boss");

    // --- æŸ¥ (Read) ---
    // æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨
    if (player_names.has(2)) {
        // è·å–å€¼ï¼Œå¦‚æœ key ä¸å­˜åœ¨ä¼š crashï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥æœ€å¥½å…ˆæ£€æŸ¥ has
        String name = player_names.get(2); 
        
        // æˆ–è€…ä½¿ç”¨ getptrï¼Œå¦‚æœä¸å­˜åœ¨è¿”å› nullptr
        const String *name_ptr = player_names.getptr(2);
    }
    
    // æŸ¥æ‰¾ç´¢å¼•ï¼ˆç”¨äºéå†å†…éƒ¨ vectorï¼‰
    int idx = player_names.find(10); // è¿”å›å†…éƒ¨ vector çš„ index
    if (idx != -1) {
        // é€šè¿‡ vector ç´¢å¼•è®¿é—®
        String val = player_names.get_value_at_index(idx);
    }

    // --- æ”¹ (Update) ---
    player_names.insert(1, "AliceUpdated"); // insert å…¼å…·æ›´æ–°åŠŸèƒ½
    
    // å¦‚æœä½ æœ‰ç´¢å¼•ï¼Œä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡ç´¢å¼•æ”¹
    // player_names.get_value_at_index(0) = "NewName";

    // --- åˆ  (Delete) ---
    player_names.erase(10); // ç§»é™¤ key ä¸º 10 çš„å…ƒç´ 
}

#include "core/templates/list.h"
#include "core/string/ustring.h"

void demo_list() {
    // --- 1. åˆ›å»º (Create) ---
    List<String> chat_log;

    // --- 2. å¢ (Add) ---
    // å°¾éƒ¨æ·»åŠ  O(1)
    chat_log.push_back("Player joined"); 
    chat_log.push_back("Player said: Hello");
    
    // å¤´éƒ¨æ·»åŠ  O(1) - é€‚åˆåšé˜Ÿåˆ—
    chat_log.push_front("System: Welcome"); 

    // åœ¨ç‰¹å®šä½ç½®æ’å…¥
    // List çš„æ’å…¥é€šå¸¸ä¾èµ–äº Element æŒ‡é’ˆ
    List<String>::Element *E = chat_log.front(); // è·å–ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹ ("System: Welcome")
    if (E) {
        // åœ¨ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹åé¢æ’å…¥
        chat_log.insert_after(E, "System: Message of the day");
    }

    // æ­¤æ—¶é¡ºåº: 
    // [0] System: Welcome
    // [1] System: Message of the day
    // [2] Player joined
    // [3] Player said: Hello

    // --- 3. æŸ¥ (Read) ---
    
    // A. è®¿é—®å¤´å°¾ O(1)
    if (!chat_log.is_empty()) {
        String first = chat_log.front()->get();
        String last = chat_log.back()->get();
    }

    // B. éå† (æ¨èæ–¹å¼ 1: èŒƒå›´ for å¾ªç¯ - Godot 4.x)
    for (const String &msg : chat_log) {
        print_line("Log: " + msg);
    }

    // C. éå† (ä¼ ç»Ÿæ–¹å¼/æ‰‹åŠ¨æ–¹å¼: ä½¿ç”¨ Element æŒ‡é’ˆ)
    // è¿™ç§æ–¹å¼åœ¨ä½ éœ€è¦æ“ä½œèŠ‚ç‚¹(å¦‚åˆ é™¤å½“å‰èŠ‚ç‚¹)æ—¶å¾ˆæœ‰ç”¨
    for (List<String>::Element *E = chat_log.front(); E; E = E->next()) {
        // E æ˜¯èŠ‚ç‚¹æŒ‡é’ˆï¼ŒE->get() è·å–å€¼
        if (E->get() == "Player joined") {
            print_line("Found join event!");
        }
    }

    // D. éšæœºè®¿é—® (è­¦å‘Šï¼šææ…¢ï¼)
    // List é‡è½½äº† []ï¼Œä½†å®ƒæ˜¯ O(N) çš„ï¼Œä¸å»ºè®®åœ¨å¾ªç¯ä¸­ä½¿ç”¨
    // String val = chat_log[2]; // æ€§èƒ½å·®ï¼Œæ…ç”¨

    // --- 4. æ”¹ (Update) ---
    // é€šè¿‡èŠ‚ç‚¹æŒ‡é’ˆç›´æ¥ä¿®æ”¹
    List<String>::Element *msg_node = chat_log.back();
    if (msg_node) {
        msg_node->get() = "Player said: Bye"; // ä¿®æ”¹å€¼
    }

    // --- 5. åˆ  (Delete) ---
    
    // A. ç§»é™¤å¤´å°¾ O(1)
    chat_log.pop_front(); // ç§»é™¤ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ª
    chat_log.pop_back();  // ç§»é™¤æœ€åä¸€ä¸ª

    // B. ç§»é™¤ç‰¹å®šå€¼ O(N) - éœ€è¦æŸ¥æ‰¾
    chat_log.erase("Player joined");

    // C. é€šè¿‡è¿­ä»£å™¨ç§»é™¤ O(1) - æœ€é«˜æ•ˆçš„ä¸­é—´åˆ é™¤æ–¹å¼
    List<String>::Element *node_to_delete = chat_log.front();
    // å‡è®¾æˆ‘ä»¬æ‰¾åˆ°äº†è¦åˆ çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹æŒ‡é’ˆ
    if (node_to_delete) {
        chat_log.erase(node_to_delete); // ç›´æ¥æŠŠè¿™ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹æ‘˜é™¤
    }

    // æ¸…ç©º
    chat_log.clear();
}

    HashMap<String, int> inventory;

    // --- å¢ (Add) / æ”¹ (Update) ---
    inventory.insert("Apple", 5);
    inventory["Banana"] = 10; // ç±»ä¼¼ std::mapï¼Œå¦‚æœä¸å­˜åœ¨åˆ™åˆ›å»ºï¼Œå­˜åœ¨åˆ™æ›´æ–°
    inventory.insert("Apple", 8); // æ›´æ–° Apple çš„å€¼ä¸º 8

    // --- æŸ¥ (Read) ---
    if (inventory.has("Banana")) {
        int count = inventory["Banana"]; // è·å–å€¼
    }

    // ä½¿ç”¨ find è·å–è¿­ä»£å™¨/æŒ‡é’ˆï¼Œé¿å…ä¸¤æ¬¡å“ˆå¸Œè®¡ç®—
    HashMap<String, int>::Iterator E = inventory.find("Apple");
    if (E) {
        int val = E->value;
        // E->key è·å–é”®
    }
    
    // éå†
    for (const KeyValue<String, int> &E : inventory) {
        print_line(E.key + ": " + itos(E.value));
    }

    // --- åˆ  (Delete) ---
    inventory.erase("Banana"); // å¦‚æœå­˜åœ¨åˆ™åˆ é™¤
    bool removed = inventory.remove("Apple"); // remove ä¹Ÿæ˜¯åˆ é™¤
}

#include "core/os/thread.h"
#include "core/os/mutex.h"
#include "core/os/semaphore.h"

class ThreadExample : public Node {
    GDCLASS(ThreadExample, Node);

private:
    Thread *worker_thread;
    Mutex *mutex;
    Semaphore *semaphore;
    bool thread_active;
    Vector<int> shared_data;

public:
    ThreadExample() {
        worker_thread = memnew(Thread);
        mutex = memnew(Mutex);
        semaphore = memnew(Semaphore);
        thread_active = true;
    }

    ~ThreadExample() {
        thread_active = false;
        semaphore->post(); // å”¤é†’çº¿ç¨‹ä½¿å…¶é€€å‡º
        if (worker_thread->is_started()) {
            worker_thread->wait_to_finish();
        }
        memdelete(worker_thread);
        memdelete(mutex);
        memdelete(semaphore);
    }

    // çº¿ç¨‹å·¥ä½œå‡½æ•°
    static void _thread_function(void *p_userdata) {
        ThreadExample *instance = static_cast<ThreadExample *>(p_userdata);

        while (instance->thread_active) {
            // ç­‰å¾…ä¿¡å·ï¼ˆç­‰å¾…ä»»åŠ¡ï¼‰
            instance->semaphore->wait();

            if (!instance->thread_active) {
                break;
            }

            // æ‰§è¡Œè€—æ—¶ä»»åŠ¡ï¼ˆä¾‹å¦‚æ•°æ®å¤„ç†ï¼‰
            Vector<int> local_data;
            
            {
                // åŠ é”è®¿é—®å…±äº«æ•°æ®
                MutexLock lock(instance->mutex);
                local_data = instance->shared_data;
            }

            // å¤„ç†æ•°æ®ï¼ˆä¸æ¶‰åŠ GUI æ“ä½œï¼‰
            for (int i = 0; i < local_data.size(); i++) {
                local_data[i] *= 2; // ç¤ºä¾‹ï¼šæ•°æ®ç¿»å€
                OS::get_singleton()->delay_usec(1000); // æ¨¡æ‹Ÿè€—æ—¶æ“ä½œ
            }

            // å¤„ç†å®Œæˆåï¼Œé€šçŸ¥ä¸»çº¿ç¨‹æ›´æ–°
            instance->call_deferred("_on_thread_complete", local_data);
        }
    }

    // å¯åŠ¨çº¿ç¨‹
    void start_thread() {
        ERR_FAIL_COND(worker_thread->is_started());
        worker_thread->start(_thread_function, this);
    }

    // æ·»åŠ ä»»åŠ¡ï¼ˆä»ä¸»çº¿ç¨‹è°ƒç”¨ï¼‰
    void add_task(const Vector<int> &data) {
        MutexLock lock(mutex);
        shared_data = data;
        semaphore->post(); // å”¤é†’å·¥ä½œçº¿ç¨‹
    }

    // çº¿ç¨‹å®Œæˆå›è°ƒï¼ˆåœ¨ä¸»çº¿ç¨‹æ‰§è¡Œï¼‰
    void _on_thread_complete(const Vector<int> &result) {
        // å¯ä»¥å®‰å…¨åœ°æ“ä½œ GUI
        print_line("Thread completed with " + itos(result.size()) + " items");
        
        // æ›´æ–° UI ç­‰
        for (int i = 0; i < result.size(); i++) {
            print_line("Result[" + itos(i) + "] = " + itos(result[i]));
        }
    }

protected:
    static void _bind_methods() {
        ClassDB::bind_method(D_METHOD("start_thread"), &ThreadExample::start_thread);
        ClassDB::bind_method(D_METHOD("add_task", "data"), &ThreadExample::add_task);
        ClassDB::bind_method(D_METHOD("_on_thread_complete", "result"), &ThreadExample::_on_thread_complete);
    }
};

void load_resources_async() {
    worker_thread->start([](void *p_userdata) {

        Ref<Texture2D> texture = ResourceLoader::load("res://texture.png");

}

void fetch_data_async(const String &url) {
    worker_thread->start([url](void *p_userdata) {

}

/* godot-cpp integration testing project.
 *
 * This is free and unencumbered software released into the public domain.
 */

#include "register_types.h"

#include <gdextension_interface.h>
#include <godot_cpp/core/class_db.hpp>
#include <godot_cpp/core/defs.hpp>
#include <godot_cpp/godot.hpp>
#include <sys/stat.h>

#include "godot_cpp/classes/editor_interface.hpp"
#include "godot_cpp/classes/editor_plugin.hpp"
#include "godot_cpp/variant/utility_functions.hpp"

#include "Test/Fow.h"

// Spline
#include "Spline/Spline.h"
#include "Spline/SplineGizmo.h"
#include "Spline/SplineGizmoPlugin.h"

//Profiler
#include "ProfilerLib/ProfilerUI.h"
#include "ProfilerLib/ProfilerTest.h"

using namespace godot;

class MyEditorPlugin : public EditorPlugin {
    GDCLASS(MyEditorPlugin, EditorPlugin);

    Ref<SplineGizmoPlugin> gizmo_plugin;
protected:
    static void _bind_methods() {

    }
public:
    virtual void _enter_tree() override {
        UtilityFunctions::print("Init :: MyEditorPlugin :: _enter_tree");
        
        gizmo_plugin.instantiate();
        gizmo_plugin->create_handle_material("HandleMat");
        
        gizmo_plugin->create_material("RedMat", Color(1.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f));
        gizmo_plugin->create_material("GreenMat", Color(0.0f, 1.0f, 0.0f));
        gizmo_plugin->create_material("BlueMat", Color(0.0f, 0.0f, 1.0f));
        gizmo_plugin->create_material("Color1", Color(0.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f));
        gizmo_plugin->create_material("Color2", Color(1.0f, 0.0f, 1.0f));
        gizmo_plugin->create_material("Color3", Color(1.0f, 1.0f, 0.0f));
        gizmo_plugin->create_material("Color4", Color(1.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f));
        add_node_3d_gizmo_plugin(gizmo_plugin);
    }

    virtual void _exit_tree() override {
        UtilityFunctions::print("UnInit :: MyEditorPlugin :: _exit_tree");

        remove_node_3d_gizmo_plugin(gizmo_plugin);
    }
};

void initialize_GodotTest_module(ModuleInitializationLevel p_level) {
    if (p_level == MODULE_INITIALIZATION_LEVEL_SCENE) {
        UtilityFunctions::print("Init :: Scene");
        GDREGISTER_CLASS(FowTexture);
        GDREGISTER_CLASS(Spline);
        GDREGISTER_CLASS(ProfilerContext);
        GDREGISTER_CLASS(ProfilerUI);




        GDREGISTER_CLASS(ProfilerTest);
    }

    if (p_level == MODULE_INITIALIZATION_LEVEL_EDITOR) {
        UtilityFunctions::print("Init :: Editor");
        GDREGISTER_CLASS(SplineGizmo);
        GDREGISTER_CLASS(SplineGizmoPlugin);
        GDREGISTER_CLASS(MyEditorPlugin);


        EditorPlugins::add_by_type<MyEditorPlugin>();

    }
    UtilityFunctions::print("Init :: None :: ", p_level);
}

void uninitialize_GodotTest_module(ModuleInitializationLevel p_level) {
    if (p_level == MODULE_INITIALIZATION_LEVEL_SCENE) {
        UtilityFunctions::print("UnInit :: Scene");

        // return;
    }
    if (p_level == MODULE_INITIALIZATION_LEVEL_EDITOR) {
        UtilityFunctions::print("UnInit :: Editor");
        EditorPlugins::remove_by_type<MyEditorPlugin>();
        // return;
    }
}

extern "C" {
// Initialization.
GDExtensionBool GDE_EXPORT
GodotTest_library_init(GDExtensionInterfaceGetProcAddress p_get_proc_address,
                       GDExtensionClassLibraryPtr p_library,
                       GDExtensionInitialization *r_initialization) {
  godot::GDExtensionBinding::InitObject init_obj(p_get_proc_address, p_library,
                                                 r_initialization);

  init_obj.register_initializer(initialize_GodotTest_module);
  init_obj.register_terminator(uninitialize_GodotTest_module);
  init_obj.set_minimum_library_initialization_level(
      MODULE_INITIALIZATION_LEVEL_SCENE);

  return init_obj.init();
}
}

#!/usr/bin/env python
import os
import sys

def log_env(env,key):
    print(f"{key}:{env[key]}")

env = SConscript("godot-cpp/SConstruct")

project_name = "Godot_DemoSR"

# For reference:
# - CCFLAGS are compilation flags shared between C and C++
# - CFLAGS are for C-specific compilation flags
# - CXXFLAGS are for C++-specific compilation flags
# - CPPFLAGS are for pre-processor flags
# - CPPDEFINES are for pre-processor defines
# - LINKFLAGS are for linking flags

# tweak this if you want to use different folders, or more folders, to store your source code in.
env.VariantDir('build', 'src', duplicate=0)
env.Append(CPPPATH=["build/"])
sources = Glob("build/*.cpp") + Glob("build/**/*.cpp") + Glob("build/**/**/*.cpp")
if env["platform"] == "macos":
    library = env.SharedLibrary(
        "{}/bin/libgdDemoSR.{}.{}.framework/libgdDemoSR.{}.{}".format(
            project_name, env["platform"], env["target"], env["platform"], env["target"]
        ),
        source=sources,
    )
elif env["platform"] == "windows":
    env["CXXFLAGS"].remove("/std:c++17")
    env.Append(CXXFLAGS = ["/std:c++20","/W4", "/WX", "/wd4100","/wd4244","/wd4305","/wd4201","/wd4127","/wd4267","/wd5054","/wd4996","/Zi","/FS"])
    env.Append(LIBS = ["libzmq"])
    env.Append(CPPDEFINES=["ZMQ_STATIC"])
    env.Append(LIBPATH = ["./lib/windows"])
    library = env.SharedLibrary(
    "{}/bin/libgdDemoSR{}{}".format(project_name, env["suffix"], env["SHLIBSUFFIX"]),
    source=sources,
    )
elif env["platform"] == "android":
    env["CXXFLAGS"].remove("-std=c++17")
    env["CXXFLAGS"].remove("-fno-exceptions")
 #   env["CXX"] = env["CXX"].replace("23.2.8568313","27.0.12077973")
    env.Append(CXXFLAGS = ["-std=c++20","-fexceptions",'-Wall', '-Wextra', '-Werror',"-Wno-unused-parameter"])
    env.Append(LIBS = ["libzmq","GLESv3"])
    env.Append(CPPDEFINES=["ZMQ_STATIC","NS_ANDROID"])
    env.Append(LIBPATH = ["./lib/android"])
    library = env.SharedLibrary(
    "{}/bin/libgdDemoSR{}{}".format(project_name, env["suffix"], env["SHLIBSUFFIX"]),
    source=sources,
    )
else:
    env["CXXFLAGS"].remove("-std=c++17")
    env["CXXFLAGS"].remove("-fno-exceptions")
    env.Append(CXXFLAGS = ["-std=c++20","-fexceptions",'-Wall', '-Wextra', "-Wno-unused-parameter","-Wno-changes-meaning"])
    env.Append(LIBS = ["libzmq","GLESv3"])
    env.Append(CPPDEFINES=["ZMQ_STATIC"])
    env.Append(LIBPATH = ["./lib"])
    library = env.SharedLibrary(
    "{}/bin/libgdDemoSR{}{}".format(project_name, env["suffix"], env["SHLIBSUFFIX"]),
    source=sources,
    )

Default(library)

     name: deploy
 on:
     push:
         branches:
         - master
 jobs:
 deploy:
     runs-on: ubuntu-latest
     steps:
         - name: Checkout
         uses: actions/checkout@v4
         with:
             fetch-depth: 0

         - name: Setup Hugo
         uses: peaceiris/actions-hugo@v3
         with:
             hugo-version: "latest"
             extended: true

         - name: Build Web
         run: hugo -D

         - name: Deploy Web
         uses: peaceiris/actions-gh-pages@v4
         with:
             PERSONAL_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.TOKEN }}
             EXTERNAL_REPOSITORY: Liyufei1/Liyufei1.github.io
             PUBLISH_BRANCH: master
             PUBLISH_DIR: ./public
             commit_message: auto deploy

item.title: Math Typesetting
item.description:
Mathematical notation in a Hugo project can be enabled by using third party JavaScript libraries.

In this example we will be using KaTeX

  • Create a partial under /layouts/partials/math.html
  • Within this partial reference the Auto-render Extension or host these scripts locally.
  • Include the partial in your templates like so:
1
2
3

{{ if or .Params.math .Site.Params.math }}
{{ partial "math.html" . }}
{{ end }}
  • To enable KaTeX globally set the parameter math to true in a project’s configuration
  • To enable KaTeX on a per page basis include the parameter math: true in content files

Note: Use the online reference of Supported TeX Functions

Examples

Inline math: $\varphi = \dfrac{1+\sqrt5}{2}= 1.6180339887â€¦$

Block math:

$$ \varphi = 1+\frac{1} {1+\frac{1} {1+\frac{1} {1+\cdots} } } $$
